data.name: Daldos Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Feel the beauty of Scandinavian motifs combined with modern technical capabilities, thanks to the music of the composer Dmitry Akki Auer.

The set includes 4 compositions that recreate the unique atmosphere of the game and complement its visual style, merging into a single whole.
data.about_the_game:
Feel the beauty of Scandinavian motifs combined with modern technical capabilities, thanks to the music of the composer Dmitry Akki Auer.

The set includes 4 compositions that recreate the unique atmosphere of the game and complement its visual style, merging into a single whole.
data.short_description: Feel the beauty of Scandinavian motifs combined with modern technical capabilities, thanks to the music of the composer Dmitry Akki Auer.
data.legal_notice: The entire soundtrack to Daldos was written by composer and sound designer Dmitry Akki.
